item.title: OSINT 101
item.description: OSINT 101 Some ressources to get into OSINT: https://osintfr.com/en/how-to-begin-faq/ https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLrFPX1Vfqk3ehZKSFeb9pVIHqxqrNW8Sy CTFs: https://sourcing.games/ (several challenges, maybe the easiest to start with) https://investigator.cybersoc.wales/challenges https://ctf.cybersoc.wales/challenges
